name: Mermaid Hijab #3
description:
The growing number of hijab users has attracted fashion designers' attention to create fashionable hijabs. Hijab has undergone many shapes, styles, materials, and additional accessories to support your appearance. Indonesia is now one of the world's recognized centres for hijab fashion. Today, wearing a hijab is no longer considered old-fashioned and conservative. The meaning of the hijab also changes. Not only as a means of covering the body, but the hijab as a means of jewellery, protection, safety, and reflecting the wearer's value. Hijab as a fashion statement is now present in the daily activity of Muslim women in Indonesia.

I created a new form of hijab in response to Indonesian society's daily trends. This mermaid hijab inspired by a soap opera (sinetron).
